title: moon
abstract: Moon is part of group exhibition on montage objects featuring life on the moon based on Vietnamese folktales: an old rat is taking a bride and moon tales of the buffalo boy under the banyan tree. Built with iPod, toilet paper cores, drinking straws, rice and cut paper figures.
credits: Concept and Realisation by Trang Nguyen
Music by Pacha a Juskanic Slovenska Orkestra
